scripts.prebuild: if [ -f node_modules/.cache/cache-info.txt ]; then echo 'CACHE EXISTS:'; cat node_modules/.cache/cache-info.txt; else echo 'No previous cache found'; fi && mkdir -p node_modules/.cache && echo 'Cache created: ' $(date) > node_modules/.cache/cache-info.txt && ls -la node_modules/.cache
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completed: ' $(date) >> node_modules/.cache/cache-info.txt && ls -la node_modules/.cache && cat node_modules/.cache/cache-info.txt
